original_text: And the devil took him up and showed him all the kingdoms of the world in a moment of time,
korean_text: 마귀가 또 예수를 이끌고 올라가서 순식간에 천하 만국을 보이며

sentences.original_text: And the devil took him up
and showed him all the kingdoms of the world in a moment of time,
sentences.korean_translation: 세상의 모든 나라를 순식간에 보여 주며,
